name: 2048 AI - Play with AI solver
description:
If you feel bored with 4×4 board size, if you want to learn how AI (artificial intelligence) solves 2048 in action. You should check out the 2048 AI app.

2048 is a classic block puzzle game. The game's objective is to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them to create a tile with the number 2048.

This app provides traditional 2048 game with more advanced features:
• Provide various AI (artificial intelligence) algorithms to play 2048.
• Board size with your choice, from as small as 2×2 up to 12×12.
• Modern design with a beautiful user interface.
• Undo function, give you another chance for an accidental slide.
• Adjust slide animation to watch AI plays games in blazing fast speed.

Enjoy with AI in 2048!
